title: Pope Leo Says AI Cannot Share Faith in the Pulpit

title: Trump halts federal use of Anthropic's technology in dispute over AI safety

title: Most AI chatbots have murky safety provisions, researchers find
description: Artificial intelligence (AI) chatbots are increasingly being used by people to do everything from answering and summarizing emails and texts the recipient never reads to deciding on travel itineraries, products and meals.
content:

title: No IIT, no IIM: Why your course may matter more in 2026
description: As artificial intelligence redraws career paths and disrupts traditional job roles, India’s long-standing obsession with elite college tags is facing its first serious test. In an AI-driven economy, the value of what students learn is increasingly challenging the prestige of where they study.
content: For decades, securing admission to the IIT or the IIM has symbolised academic excellence, social mobility, and career security in India. For millions of families, the IIT–IIM tag has been viewed not just as an education milestone but as a near-guaran... [10169 chars]

title: Quantum computing will solve real-world problems within a decade
description: Sandia National Laboratories Director Laura McGill says scalable quantum computing capable of tackling real-world problems could arrive within 10 years, as it expands its quantum and artificial intelligence research to support U.S. national security and industry.
content:
Sandia National Laboratories Director Laura McGill said this week that she believes that in less than 10 years it will have developed quantum computing capabilities “that are scalable to real problems.”

title: Trump orders US agencies to stop using Anthropic technology in clash over AI safety
description: President Donald Trump has ordered all U.S. agencies to stop using Anthropic technology after the company’s unusually public dispute with the Pentagon over artificial intelligence safety. Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth also said Friday he was designating Anthropic as a supply chain risk, a move that could prevent U.S. military vendors from working with the company. Trump’s comments Friday just before the Pentagon’s deadline for Anthropic to allow unrestricted military use of its AI technology or face consequences. CEO Dario Amodei has said his company “cannot in good conscience accede” to the Defense Department’s demands.
content: WASHINGTON (AP) — The Trump administration on Friday ordered all U.S. agencies to stop using Anthropic’s artificial intelligence technology and imposed other major penalties, culminating an unusually public clash between the government and the compan... [1349 chars]

title: Anthropic refuses to allow Pentagon unrestricted use of artificial intelligence
description: “These threats do not change our position: we cannot in good conscience accede to their request,” Anthropic chief executive Dario Amodei says in a statement.
content:

title: AI is no longer a technology story. It's an evolving human story
description: Artificial intelligence is no longer a speculative technology story. It is now a macro story playing out in the real world. And the world's sharpest minds cannot agree on what happens next: gloom or bloom?
content:
The jobs that were supposed to be safe aren't. The timeline that felt distant doesn't anymore. The world is in the grip of fear, uncertainty and anxiety, with just a sliver of hope.
